description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Legal team represents the school district in legal matters and advises staff to ensure the district complies with laws and minimizes risk. Most of their work involves employment law and working with more than 5 labor unions that represent district employees, but Legal is also involved with litigation, facilities, finances, and student matters like reporting child abuse, discipline, and advising on student’s civil rights.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
